fields.label: Optional Title
fields.name: optional_title
fields.instructions: This title is optional. If nothing is filled in here the title "Tips for Caregivers:" will show instead.

fields.label: Testimonial(s) to Display
fields.name: testimonial_to_display
fields.instructions: If more than one testimonial is selected, ONE of the selected testimonials will be pulled randomly on the page at a time.

fields.label: Confetti?
fields.name: confetti
fields.instructions: Should there be confetti on this page?

fields.label: Progress Bar?
fields.name: progress_bar
fields.instructions: Should this page have a progress bar?

fields.label: Google Font embed Link(s)
fields.name: google_font_embed_links
fields.instructions: This is the "link" option in google webfonts. Just paste that whole box of stuff here. This will add your desired google webfont into the site.
fields.default_value:
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@300;400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

fields.label: Primary Font
fields.name: primary_font
fields.instructions: This is JUST the font string. DO NOT include the "font-family:" portion.

fields.label: Body Font Size
fields.name: body_font_size
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

fields.label: Main Heading Font
fields.name: main_heading_font
fields.instructions:
If you want to use the same font for all headings, paste it here. This is JUST the font string. DO NOT include the "font-family:" portion.
Each individual heading font can be overwritten with the following fields.

fields.label: Heading 1 Font
fields.name: heading_1_font
fields.instructions: This is JUST the font string. DO NOT include the "font-family:" portion.

fields.label: Heading 1 Color
fields.name: heading_1_color
fields.instructions: If nothing is entered here then this will default back to the Secondary Color set in the General Settings.

fields.label: Heading 1 Font Size
fields.name: heading_1_font_size
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

fields.label: Button Link
fields.name: button_link
fields.instructions: Don't forget the https:// in your link.

choices.center: Center (will keep its initial width but center itself on the page)

fields.label: Page Break Background
fields.name: page_break_background
fields.instructions: NOTE: If using the left image or right image layout, it will look broken without an image.

fields.label: Page Break Background
fields.name: page_break_background
fields.instructions: NOTE: If using the left image or right image layout, it will look broken without an image.

fields.label: Callout 01 Title Icon
fields.name: callout_01_title_icon
fields.instructions: Icon must be 36px wide and 36px tall

fields.label: Callout 02 Title Icon
fields.name: callout_02_title_icon
fields.instructions: Icon must be 36px wide and 36px tall

fields.label: Callout 03 Title Icon
fields.name: callout_03_title_icon
fields.instructions: Icon must be 36px wide and 36px tall

title: Theme Options - Colors

fields.label: Primary Site Color
fields.name: primary_site_color
fields.instructions: This is the primary text color.

fields.label: Secondary Color
fields.name: secondary_color
fields.instructions: This is the secondary color for the website. By default this is the color that the headings on the site are set to.

fields.label: Button Color
fields.name: button_color
fields.instructions: This is the button text color.

fields.label: Button Background Color
fields.name: button_background_color
fields.instructions: This is the button background color. This is also the color used on the button border by default. This can be overwritten in the child theme.

fields.label: Button Hover Color
fields.name: button_hover_color
fields.instructions: This is the button text color on hover.

fields.label: Button Hover Background Color
fields.name: button_hover_background_color
fields.instructions: This is the button background color on hover. This is also the color used on the button border by default. This can be overwritten in the child theme.

description: There's no need to add black, white, or grey. The theme already has #ccc and #666 built in. These colors are set to variables in the _vars.scss file. These values can be overwritten in the main.scss or _vars.scss file in the child theme.

fields.label: Optional Footer Logo
fields.name: optional_footer_logo
fields.instructions: This is optional. If nothing is uploaded to this field the footer logo will default to the Site Logo. Set in the general site settings.

fields.label: Social Media
fields.name: social_media
fields.instructions: Add as many or as few social media links as you need.

sub_fields.label: Social Icon
sub_fields.name: social_icon
sub_fields.instructions: You can find your icon options here. Just find the icon you want and paste the text for that icon here.

fields.label: Slide Linking
fields.name: slide_linking
fields.instructions: How would you like the slides to link?

fields.label: Default Header Image
fields.name: default_header_image
fields.instructions: This is the default header image if there is no featured image on the page or post. This is also the header image for the index, archive, 404, and search pages.

fields.label: Facebook Opengraph Image
fields.name: facebook_opengraph_image
fields.instructions: This is the default image used in the facebook open graph code.

fields.label: Fixed Pagebreak Background
fields.name: fixed_pagebreak_background
fields.instructions: Do you want to set ALL pagebreak backgrounds as position fixed? NOTE: This can be overwritten on an individual level per pagebreak.

fields.label: Post Category
fields.name: post_category
fields.instructions: Post Category to Display

fields.label: Optional Button Link Text
fields.name: optional_button_link_text
fields.instructions: If this is not filled in the button text will read "Learn More".
